Key Match Events: Dhananjaya de Silva and Charith Asalanka's valuable partnership sealed the deal for Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Wanindu Hasaranga wins the player of the match award
Sri Lanka beat Afghanistan by 6 wickets
Afghanistan are out of the race for the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka moved to third position in the table with four points in four matches
Others: Hasaranga picked up a three-wicket haul and restricted Afghanistan to 144
